name: Electrophysiological Dataset of Neuronal Post-Synaptic Currents in the Primate Anterior Insular Cortex
citation: Jing, Junzhan (2026) Electrophysiological Dataset of Neuronal Post-Synaptic Currents in the Primate Anterior Insular Cortex (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001752/draft
description: The dataset contains the intracellular recordings from Macaque Anterior Insular Cortex neurons. We used recorded neuronal post-synaptic currents from monkeyanterior insular cortex. The dataset contains miniature E/IPSCs and spontaneous E/IPSCs recorded from VENs and PCs in moneky AIC.
studyTarget: We recoded miniature E/IPSCs and spontaneous E/IPSCs from VENs and PCs in monkey AIC to confirm the neuronal connection differences between the cell types.
acknowledgement: This work was supported by  Natural Science Foundation of China.

relatedResource.name: Cell Atlas and Novel Signal Processing Strategy in Primate Insular Cortex
